Package chess

Class Board

java.lang.Object
chess.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The Board of the game that handles all of the Logic
Author:
Timothy Zhang, Jonathan Konopka

      public int checkPiece​(java.lang.String in, int white)
      Checks to see if the moves is legal (King remains in check or moves into check)
      Parameters:
      in - the move to be made
      white - the current player
      Returns:
      0 if the move is legal 1 if not
